column1: amended by Penal Code (Amendment) Act No- 22 of 1995.
After trial, the learned High Court Judge of Kuliyapitiya of his judgment dated
22nd  March  2018  found  the  1st  accused  guilty  for  the  1st  count  preferred
against  him.  The  2nd  accused  was  convicted  for  the  2nd  and  the  6th  counts
preferred  against  him.  The  3rd  accused  was  convicted  for  the  3rd  and  the  5th
counts preferred, while the 4th accused was convicted for the 4th count.
